mapper.sql: AR.REGISTRATION_ID, AR.AVM_TRX_ID, AR.COMPANY_ID, AR.BRANCH_ID, AR.REGISTRATION_NO, AR.REGISTRATION_DATE, AR.REMARKS, AR.STATUS_ID, AR.STATUS_CODE, AR.CREATED_BY, AR.CREATION_DATE, AR.LAST_UPDATE_BY, AR.LAST_UPDATE_DATE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID, (case when AR.BRANCH_ID = -1 then 'Head Office' else (SELECT ORGANIZATION_NAME from WOS_ORGANIZATIONS where ORGANIZATION_ID = AR.BRANCH_ID and rownum = 1) end )BRANCH_NAME, BLD.DESCRIPTION,
from SOC_REGISTRATION_HDR AR INNER JOIN BSE_LOOKUP_DEPENDENTS BLD on BLD.DETAIL_CODE = AR.STATUS_CODE LEFT JOIN SAM_USERS U ON U.USER_ID = AR.LAST_UPDATE_BY
order by ${orderByClause}

select DISTINCT 'false' as QUERYID, (case when AR.BRANCH_ID = -1 then 'HEADOFFICE' else (SELECT SUBSTR (ORGANIZATION_CODE, -5) as branch_code from WOS_ORGANIZATIONS where ORGANIZATION_ID = AR.BRANCH_ID and rownum = 1) end )BRANCH_CODE, (case when AR.BRANCH_ID = -1 then 'Head Office' else (SELECT ORGANIZATION_NAME from WOS_ORGANIZATIONS where ORGANIZATION_ID = AR.BRANCH_ID and rownum = 1) end )BRANCH_NAME,
from SOC_REGISTRATION_HDR AR where AR.REGISTRATION_ID = #{registrationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.update: update SOC_REGISTRATION_HDR SET STATUS_ID = #{statusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CODE= #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where REGISTRATION_ID = #{registrationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SOC_STOCK_OPNAME_UNREG_ASSETS SET ASSET_ID = (select max(asset_id) from soc_assets), LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where STOCK_OPNAME_UNREG_ASSET_ID = #{stockOpnameUnregAssetId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert:
select SOC_REGISTRATION_HDR_S.nextVal from dual
insert into SOC_REGISTRATION_HDR ( REGISTRATION_ID, AVM_TRX_ID, COMPANY_ID, BRANCH_ID, REGISTRATION_NO, REGISTRATION_DATE, REMARKS, STATUS_ID, STATUS_CODE, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE) values (#{registrationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{avmTrxIdString,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{branchId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{registrationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registrationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (SELECT LOOKUP_ID FROM BSE_LOOKUP_DEPENDENTS WHERE DETAIL_CODE = #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rownum=1), #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from SOC_REGISTRATION_HDR
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.sql: ASSET_ID, EBS_ASSET_ID, ASSET_NUMBER, TAG_NUMBER, SERIAL_NUMBER, DESCRIPTION, CATEGORY_ID, COMPANY_ID, BRANCH_ID, LOCATION_ID, POSITION, DATE_PLACED_IN_SERVICE, LIFE_IN_MONTHS, ORIGINAL_COST, UNREVALUED_COST, BOOK_TYPE_CODE, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT bld.LOOKUP_ID KEY, bld.DETAIL_CODE VALUE, bld.DESCRIPTION DESCRIPTION FROM BSE_LOOKUP_DEPENDENTS bld WHERE rownum=1 AND UPPER(bld.DETAIL_CODE) = #{key} ORDER BY bld.DESCRIPTION ASC

select 'false' as QUERYID,
FROM SOC_REGISTRATION_HDR AR LEFT JOIN SAM_USERS U ON U.USER_ID = AR.LAST_UPDATE_BY where AVM_TRX_ID = #{avmTrxIdString, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ROWNUM = 1
select registration_no from(select registration_no from SOC_REGISTRATION_HDR order by registration_id desc) where rownum =1
mapper.sql: so.STOCK_OPNAME_UNREG_ASSET_ID, so.STOCK_OPNAME_ID, so.ASSET_ID, so.TAG_NUMBER, so.category_id, so.SERIAL_NUMBER, so.last_update_by, so.created_by, (case when so.DESCRIPTION is not null then so.DESCRIPTION else so.DESCRIPTION end) DESCRIPTION, so.CATEGORY_ID, so.COMPANY_ID, so.BRANCH_ID, (case when so.BRANCH_ID = -1 then 'HEADOFFICE' else (SELECT SUBSTR (ORGANIZATION_CODE, -5) as branch_code from WOS_ORGANIZATIONS where ORGANIZATION_ID = so.BRANCH_ID and rownum =1)end) BRANCH_CODE, (case when so.BRANCH_ID = -1 then 'Head Office' else(SELECT ORGANIZATION_NAME from WOS_ORGANIZATIONS where ORGANIZATION_ID = so.BRANCH_ID and rownum =1)end) BRANCH_NAME, so.LOCATION_ID, (SELECT LOCATION_CODE from WOS_LOCATIONS where LOCATION_ID = so.LOCATION_ID and rownum =1) LOCATION_CODE, (SELECT LOCATION_NAME from WOS_LOCATIONS where LOCATION_ID = so.LOCATION_ID and rownum =1) LOCATION_NAME, so.DATE_PLACED_IN_SERVICE, so.LIFE_IN_MONTHS, so.ORIGINAL_COST, so.UNREVALUED_COST, so.BOOK_TYPE_CODE, so.ASSET_TYPE_ID, so.ASSET_TYPE_CODE, so.POSITION, so.OPNAME_ACTION_STATUS_ID, so.OPNAME_ACTION_STATUS_CODE,(select DESCRIPTION from BSE_LOOKUP_DEPENDENTS where LOOKUP_ID = OPNAME_ACTION_STATUS_ID and DETAIL_CODE = OPNAME_ACTION_STATUS_CODE and rownum =1) OPNAME_ACTION_STATUS, OPNAME_RESULT_ID,OPNAME_RESULT_CODE,(select DESCRIPTION from BSE_LOOKUP_DEPENDENTS where LOOKUP_ID = OPNAME_RESULT_ID and DETAIL_CODE = OPNAME_RESULT_CODE and rownum =1) OPNAME_RESULT, OPNAME_SUGEST_ID,OPNAME_SUGEST_CODE,(select DESCRIPTION from BSE_LOOKUP_DEPENDENTS where LOOKUP_ID = OPNAME_SUGEST_ID and DETAIL_CODE = OPNAME_SUGEST_CODE and rownum =1) OPNAME_SUGEST, OPNAME_HO_SUGEST_ID,OPNAME_HO_SUGEST_CODE,(select DESCRIPTION from BSE_LOOKUP_DEPENDENTS where LOOKUP_ID = OPNAME_HO_SUGEST_ID and DETAIL_CODE = OPNAME_HO_SUGEST_CODE and rownum =1) OPNAME_HO_SUGEST, so.CREATION_DATE, U.USER_NAME LAST_UPDATE_BY_NAME, so.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, EC.segment1 CATEGORY_NAME, (select description from bse_lookup_dependents where detail_code = so.asset_type_code) as ASSET_TYPE
mapper.insert:
select SOC_ASSETS_S.nextVal from dual
insert into SOC_ASSETS ( ASSET_ID, TAG_NUMBER, SERIAL_NUMBER, DESCRIPTION, CATEGORY_ID, COMPANY_ID, BRANCH_ID, LOCATION_ID, POSITION, DATE_PLACED_IN_SERVICE, LIFE_IN_MONTHS, ORIGINAL_COST, UNREVALUED_COST, BOOK_TYPE_CODE, RETIRED_FLAG, ASSET_TYPE_ID, ASSET_TYPE_CODE, NET_BOOK_VALUE, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{tagNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{branchId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{locationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datePlaceInService,jdbcType=DATE}, #{lifeInMonths,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{originalCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unrevaluedCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bookTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{retiredFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetTypeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{assetTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netBookValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTR(branch_code, 0, 3) AS BRANCH_CODE FROM wos_organization_versions WHERE organization_id = #{branchId, jdbcType=DECIMAL} and TRUNC (SYSDATE) BETWEEN date_from AND date_to
